verbs.description: [V: hate] [ARG1: your job] but ca n't leave here what you do you hate your job but you ’re too busy to look and you ca n’t quit your job to free up time for a job search because 1 it better to look when you have a job and 2 you need to maintain your salary donald trump caroline ceniza levine jack canfield job search two harbors press
